profile.name: Alex Chen
profile.title: Full Stack Developer
profile.summary: Passionate full-stack developer with 5+ years of experience building scalable web applications. I love turning complex problems into simple, beautiful solutions. Currently focused on React, Node.js, and cloud infrastructure.

projects.title: CloudSync Pro
projects.description: A real-time file synchronization platform built with Node.js and React. Supports end-to-end encryption and collaborative editing.

projects.title: AI Task Manager
projects.description: Smart task management app that uses AI to prioritize and categorize tasks automatically. Features natural language input and voice commands.

projects.title: DevMetrics Dashboard
projects.description: Analytics dashboard for development teams. Tracks code quality, deployment frequency, and team productivity metrics.

experience.description: Lead developer for the core platform team. Architected microservices infrastructure serving 1M+ daily users. Mentored junior developers and established code review practices.
Built the entire frontend from scratch using React. Implemented REST APIs and database schemas. Reduced page load time by 60% through optimization.
Developed responsive websites for various clients. Learned modern JavaScript frameworks and agile methodologies.
